outfits.name: sea-breeze-dandelion
outfits.description: Jean's summer wear. Light and cool, but no less elegant for it. The perfect choice for a trip to the seaside.

outfits.name: summertime-sparkle
outfits.description: Barbara's beach attire. This pretty skirt brims with summer vitality and carries with it a cool ocean breeze.

outfits.name: opulent-splendor
outfits.description: Keqing's formal wear. Amidst the beautiful dawn of the Lantern Rite, the threads weaved by days of hard work intertwine into a light yet magnificent appearance.

outfits.name: orchid_s-evening-gown
outfits.description: Ningguang's formal wear. The long cyan skirt traces her elegant curves, and the butterfly wings at her ankles lend the outfit a touch of light grace.
